username.name: Your MAL Username
username.description: Must be entered exactly as it appears on MyAnimeList. This is not required, but will reduce the impact on page load times from the pop-up images.

banner-fade-multiplier.name: Banner Fade Multiplier
banner-fade-multiplier.description: Modifies the banner fade effect. Higher = more fade. Min 0 & recommended max 1.

banner-opacity.name: Banner Opacity
banner-opacity.description: Similar to the banner fade, however this control the opacity of the entire image. Can be used in tandem.

cursor.name: Cursor
cursor.description: An image URL for a custom cursor.

cursor-pos.name: Cursor Position
cursor-pos.description: Change the amount the cursor is offset from its default placement. Useful for when cursor images have a lot of white space on the edges.

cursor-link.name: Cursor for Links
cursor-link.description: This cursor will display while hovering over links.

all-anime.name: Per-Category Styling (All Anime)
all-anime.description: Style your page differently while viewing the All Anime page.

banner-fade-multiplier.name: Banner Fade Multiplier
banner-fade-multiplier.description: Modifies the banner fade effect. Higher = more fade. Min 0 & recommended max 1.

banner-opacity.name: Banner Opacity
banner-opacity.description: Similar to the banner fade, however this control the opacity of the entire image. Can be used in tandem.

cursor.name: Cursor
cursor.description: An image URL for a custom cursor.

cursor-pos.name: Cursor Position
cursor-pos.description: Change the amount the cursor is offset from its default placement. Useful for when cursor images have a lot of white space on the edges.

cursor-link.name: Cursor for Links
cursor-link.description: This cursor will display while hovering over links.

cursor-link-pos.name: Cursor Position for Links
cursor-link-pos.description: This will have no effect if you have not added a URL in the "Cursor for Links" option.

fonts.name: Change fonts
fonts.description: This guide by Shishio-kun will show you how to change the fonts!
